author: {'steamid': '76561198071375554', 'num_games_owned': 2813, 'num_reviews': 401, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1484079182}
review:
One of my very favorite games. The story is interesting, graphics are amazing, hidden objects and mini games are fun to play. (And you have your own flying friend to help you)

The story about Evangeline, an engineer who was taught by Dr. Ink. There was a series of earthquakes who Dr. Ink think they are abnormal and thus he is working on a research, but alas he was kidnapped and Evangeline had to investigate the whole thing and rescue her teacher.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=839569970

Graphics and music are amazing in this game as well as the hidden objects scenes and puzzles. The journal keeps track of your journey which is a very good thing to have in these type of games.

Pros:
+Amazing graphics
+Nice music
+Interesting story and characters
+Steam achievements
+Not very short game including the bonus chapter
+Voice acting is good except for the town people.

Cons:
-Can get boring in some areas.
-It can be short for some people, yet I enjoyed it

I recommend it if you won't enjoy the story, you'll at least love the graphics.

[quote]𝐹𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑜𝑟𝑒 𝑟𝑒𝑣𝑖𝑒𝑤𝑠 𝑐𝘩𝑒𝑐𝑘 𝑚𝑦 𝑐𝑢𝑟𝑎𝑡𝑜𝑟 𝑝𝑎𝑔𝑒 [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/32399565/]𝐹𝑒𝑒𝑛𝑎'𝑠 𝐶𝘩𝑜𝑖𝑐𝑒[/url][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198151665601', 'num_games_owned': 302, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1474471328}
review: Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink  стала моей любимой игрой этого жанра. Весьма неплохая графика, интересные головоломки, а главное -  это игра с элементами стимпанка! Жаль, что таких игр крайне мало. Она точно заслуживает внимания каждого ценителя "поиска предметов".

author: {'steamid': '76561198093837561', 'num_games_owned': 398, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 984, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 448, 'last_played': 1541358390}
review:
Tylko jedna osoba może powstrzymać nadchodzącą katastrofę, jest nią Ewangelina Glass, a my pomożemy jej rozwikłać wielką tajemnicę.

[h1]OPRAWA[/h1]
Piękne, ręcznie rysowane lokacje sprawiają, że Clockwork Tales ma niesamowity urok, po pierwsze kolorystyka jest bardzo przyjemna dla oka, a po drugie widać ogromną ilość pracy, którą włożono w tę grę. Każde odwiedzane przez nas miejsce jest szczegółowo dopracowane. Oświetlenie jest idealnie dobrane, ponieważ potrafi stworzyć tajemniczą atmosferę bez wlewania mroku w każdy zakamarek. Animacje postaci są bardzo dobrze zrobione, przez co możemy polubić spotkane na drodze osobistości. Oprawa dźwiękowa jest przyjemna dla ucha dzięki czemu mocniej zagłębiamy się w świat gry, a dźwięki przyrody sprawiają, że możemy odstresować się po długim dniu w pracy lub szkole. Głosy naszych rozmówców są bardzo dobrze dobrane dzięki czemu możemy odczuć towarzyszące im emocje. 

[h1]FABUŁA[/h1]
Trafiamy do pewnego miasteczka położonego między ośnieżonymi szczytami. Sprowadza nas genialny doktor Ink, który niedługo po naszym przybyciu znika w tajemniczych okolicznościach. Od tej chwili naszym celem jest odnalezienie geniusza oraz odkrycie przyczyn potężnych trzęsień ziemi. Znajdujemy się w czasach parowej rewolucji, więc jak sama nazwa wskazuje napotkamy na swojej drodze wiele maszyn, między innymi naszego małego pomocnika Mateusza, który pomoże nam w sytuacjach gdzie sami nie dalibyśmy sobie rady. 

[h1]ROZGRYWKA[/h1]
Odkrywając kolejne części tajemnicy ciążącej nad miasteczkiem trafimy na wiele łamigłówek o zróżnicowanym stopniu trudności oraz scen z ukrytymi obiektami, w których będziemy musieli wykazać się dużą spostrzegawczością. Zdobyte wcześniej przedmioty musimy wykorzystać w odpowiednich do tego miejscach co zwiększy również naszą kreatywność, ponieważ rozwiązania nie są zawsze takie oczywiste. Kolekcjonerzy będą mogli znaleźć 30 mechanicznych robaczków.

[h1]PODSUMOWUJĄC[/h1]
Szczegółowo dopracowane lokacje są dowodem na to, że twórcy włożyli naprawdę dużo pracy w tą odsłonę. Relaksujące udźwiękowienie oraz śliczna oprawa graficzna tworzą cudowny klimat. Ciekawa opowieść wciągnie nas na dobre kilka godzin. 

[h1]DLA TYCH, KTÓZY NIE LUBIĄ CZYTAĆ[/h1]
+ Śliczna oprawa graficzna
+ Relaksujące udźwiękowienie
+ Wciągająca opowieść
+ Przedmioty kolekcjonerskie
+ Osiągnięcia steam
+ Dodatkowa przygoda
+ Polski produkt

Jeżeli moja recenzja pomogła Ci przy podjęciu decyzji nad zakupem, będę wdzięczny jeśli ją ocenisz/skomentujesz, co jest dla mnie ogromną motywacją do pracy nad kolejnymi tekstami.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128141465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482708309}
review:
Solides Wimmelbildspiel im Steampunk-Look!

Natürlich sollte man bei einem WBS seine Erwartungen allgemein ein bisschen herunterschrauben: Die wenigsten WBS warten mit packender Geschichte, High-End-Grafik und ewig langem Spielvergnügen auf. Aber "Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink" erfüllt meine Genre-Erwartungen völlig:

+ zeitgemäße Grafik mit kleineren Videosequenzen und Animationen
+ abwechslungsreiche Rätsel, u. a. klassisches WBS, Drähte verbinden, Bilder aus Scheiben zusammendrehen, Puzzles, kleinere Logikrätsel, ...
+ atmosphärische Steampunk-Rätsel, z. B. Zahnradmechanismen reparieren, Erfinderporträts ihren Erfindungen zuordnen, Gleitflügel und mechanische Vögel bauen
+ teils witzige Dialoge
+ nette Musik
+ Musik und Wallpaper problemlos speicherbar

= Geschichte fesselt nicht
= blasse Charaktere
= Bonuskapitel ist sehr kurz geraten
= Gesamtspielzeit von etwa 4 Stunden
= meist logisch aufgebaut
= letzte Errungenschaft [spoiler] schafft man nur, wenn man von Anfang an auf "schwer" oder das Spiel noch einmal spielt [/spoiler]

- teilweise ZU stereotyp (böses Militär mit deutschem Akzent, fast alle Steampunk-Stereotypen eingebaut)
- WBS tauchen teilweise an komischen Orten in der Geschichte auf
- die Suche nach den mechanischen Käfern ist zu einfach

Insgesamt ist das Spiel für Gelegenheitsspieler und eher pazifistische Steampunkfans zu empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073972405', 'num_games_owned': 630, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1481968856}
review:
+ Beautiful Art
+ Solid music
+ Some puzzles are fairly original
+ Good hint system

- Boring writing
- Very low difficulty for puzzles
- Some puzzles are poorly explained
- Weird character animation

I do like hidden object games—The Tiny Bang Story, for example—but this one was a touch too far on the easy side, to the point where many of the puzzles felt like busywork. The hidden object segments were easy to the point you could just click randomly on objects that stood out and it was usually something you were supposed to be finding anyway.

I was also expecting too much from the writing based on the descriptions and other reviews. The few characters you meet and talk to are just plot devices. It's worth mentioning the way they're animated gets into serious uncanny valley territory at times, too. Their faces move and warp while the rest of their body remains perfectly still, which takes some getting used to. The storyline turned out to be just an excuse plot (an evil man has a machine that he uses to create earthquakes, because...well, just because). The world has a few interesting details, like having patron saints for different scientific advancements, but the steampunk here was really more of an aesthetic than anything.

I can easily imagine others enjoying this, so if you're just looking for a pretty world with lots of soothingly easy puzzles to tinker with, by all means pick this game up. It would also be great for young kids. I'm afraid it just wasn't for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076665762', 'num_games_owned': 1343, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1481726588}
review: Very good hidden object game with beautiful graphics and pleasant music. Interesting steampunk and World War I theme. 4 hours of gameplay is enough to complete the game on Advanced level of difficulty, including the bonus chapter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115673548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1481494915}
review:
[h1]スチームパンクな世界観のクリックアドベンチャーゲーム[/h1]
副題の「グラスとインク」はどちらも人物名を指しそれ以上の深い意味はありません。
評判の高いArtifexのゲームなのでグラフィックとシステムどちらも質が高いです。

ただ、同パブリッシャーの他のタイトルと比べると
こちらは際立って優れた部分が目立ちません。
見返して見るとちょい足し程度のスチームパンク要素だったり。
目の肥えた方には期待外れかもしれませんね。

日本語化されていて難易度もカジュアルな作りでオススメです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198104648513', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1482791560}
review: Příjemná logická oddechovka ze steampunkového světa. Pěkné animace, chytré hádanky a skládačky. Vůbec nevadila absence češtiny. Jediné co bych hře vytknula je její obtížnost. Až na pár okamžiků jsem vylouskala skládačky jedním dechem. Zklamalo mě, že při hraní na vyšší obtížnost, jsou skládačky totožné jako při obtížnosti pro začátečníky.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112930564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1470472135}
review:
히든 오브젝트, 또는 포인트 앤 클릭
이라고 언급하는 장르의 게임,
Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink 입니다.

이런 류의 게임은 초등학생 때 했던
어드벤처 게임인 원숭이 섬의 비밀이나
잠깐 몇 번 해본 방탈출 게임이 전부입니다.

그래서 익숙하지 않은 장르였는데 막상 시도해보니,
진행하면서 흥미를 불러일으키는 스토리.
많이 쉽지도, 어렵지도 않은 난이도와 도전과제.
(제가 선호하는 요소인) 좋은 한글화로 인해 재미있었습니다.

[h1] 신비로운 평점 : ★★★☆ [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198299249599', 'num_games_owned': 742, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 414, 'last_played': 1481791004}
review: 点击解密游戏   还带简中

author: {'steamid': '76561198068218938', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1480367047}
review:
Este juego es un point and click muy simple en todos los sentidos, una historia decente con unos puzles generalmente simples. Para mi lo mejor de este juego ha sido su banda sonora, bastante agradable, y la sensación de relajación que te transmite.
Si quieres un juego tranquilo con el que relajarte, Clockwork Tales cumple perfectamente y te lo recomiendo, pero ten en cuenta que no te vas a encontrar una historia compleja o un desafio en cuanto a los puzles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197234309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 511, 'last_played': 1472406116}
review: I liked this game. Standard point and click hidden object game, but definitely strange enough to keep me interested. achievements are pretty easy although you can miss a couple of them if rushing through. I'd rate it 6.5 - 7 out of 10. Definitely recommend!

author: {'steamid': '76561198170481649', 'num_games_owned': 752, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1478153449}
review:
虽然也是个具备点点点要素的游戏……
然而我十分推荐！
游戏全程语音（考四级的筒子们有福了），画面还比较精致，音效在同类游戏里尚属出色，谜题也可以选择难度等级，没有刻意为难人的感受，剧情还可以，自带简中。
总而言之，这是一部同类中素质还不错的游戏，推荐玩耍！

author: {'steamid': '76561197971490143', 'num_games_owned': 1321, 'num_reviews': 226, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1479053355}

author: {'steamid': '76561198171547162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 895, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 895, 'last_played': 1478964354}
review: Zarąbista gierka 😊😊😊

author: {'steamid': '76561198325100786', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1478424453}
review:
《发条传说：格拉斯和英克》是一款不错的解密游戏，中间夹带着很多有意思的小游戏，。这是一场在精美蒸汽朋克世界中的奇妙冒险。就算卡关也不用去查攻略，这款游戏自带完善的提示系统，本身的难度也不是很大，，玩法与大多数解密游戏差不多，剧情流程简单不拖杂，画面也是比较精致的，更重要的是，这款游戏有简体中文！有简体中文！有简体中文！
总体上看，这款游戏以精美的2D画面征服玩家，以充满逻辑性的谜题贯穿整个游玩过程，喜欢解密游戏类型的玩家还是值得一玩的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198343695975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1478692249}
review:
很常规的一款解谜游戏，人物有面部动作，虽然有时候看起来有点扭曲⋯⋯
游戏方式还是很多样的，手残和没啥眼力的选了简单模式，正篇通过3小时。
不过里面槽点很多，为什么反派你最后机关的门还是坏的！你自己穿墙进去吗？

author: {'steamid': '76561197991010756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 360, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1473865426}
review: Réalisation supérieure à la moyenne, scénario peu intéressant.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997740965', 'num_games_owned': 8001, 'num_reviews': 2015, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1478444832}
review:
Добротный квест с элементами поиска предметов. Обычно бывает наоборот, но Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink действительно классная игра. У руля стоит интереснейший сюжет, который до финала раскрывает мир игры. Я не кричу про шедевральность, но для поиска предметов игра очень хороша. 
 Пройти ее можно очень быстро, но я еще не встречал иного в подобных играх. После прохождения откроют новую главу (Как отдельная игра), которая является приквелом к основной истории. Добротно и интересно, друзья, советую.

author: {'steamid': '76561197981557797', 'num_games_owned': 5236, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1478406551}
review: The puzzles and hiddent object scenes are relatively easy; but it is all very well done.  I'd recommend it if you're looking for a short relaxing game to kill a couple of hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157838763', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1474828022}
review: Really nice game, with interesting puzzles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133861393', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1480593844}
review:
スチームパンクの世界で頻発する地震の原因究明に挑むアドベンチャー
レトロとハイテクが混ざったようなスチームパンクの世界観が好きな人にはお勧め。
蒸気、パイプ、メーター、など工学的なモチーフが好きなら心地よくプレイできることでしょう。
ロケーションは少なめですが、ワクワクするような場面が続くので、
飽きること無く最後までやることができました。
個人的にはいかにも博士っぽい教授の風貌が非常に面白かった。
残念なのはたまに教授が女言葉になること。
それもまあ、かわいいっちゃかわいい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198047279716', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 644, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 517, 'last_played': 1600971053}
review: Wieder mal ein richtig gutes Spiel von Artifex Mundi. Noch dazu mal ein ungewohnt kniffliges. Teilweise sogar seeehr knifflig. Ich kann jedem, der auf diese Art von Spielen steht, dieses hier nur empfehlen. Die Entwickler verstehen ihr Handwerk und sie haben es hier meiner Meinung nach wieder mal sehr gut umgesetzt. Wenn man überhaupt ein Manko finden wollte, wären es einzig die Dialoge der unwichtigen Nebenpersonen. Bei mehreren hört man raus, dass es deutsche sind, die der englischen Sprache nicht wirklich mächtig sind. Das tut dem Spielspaß aber für mich absolut nichts negatives. Von mir eine absolute Empfehlung für jeden, der auf Wimmelbild / Point&Klick / Rätsel-Minigames steht. Ich hab für den ersten Durchlauf inkl. Bonuslevel ca 5h benötigt und ich werd es auf jeden Fall nochmal durchspielen, um alle Achievements zu erhalten. Danke an die Entwickler... macht weiter so :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197965615203', 'num_games_owned': 2853, 'num_reviews': 302, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 382, 'last_played': 1477743137}

review: Pierwsze wrażenia jak najbardziej na plus. Intuicyjna obsługa, wyważony poziom trudności zagadek, nieszpetliwa oprawa graficzna i dźwiękowa. Przyjemna gra na kilka (?) wieczorów w kontekście ceny (niecałe 3 Euro w promocji).

author: {'steamid': '76561198062558470', 'num_games_owned': 903, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1477385469}
review:
I finished this Game a while back and I must say its one of the Good Hidden Object Games out there. The Atmosphere is great, the puzzles are not to hard and not to easy. 

The Graphics are as always on these Games very artistic and amazing in their own way.  The Voice Acting is for a small game like this very well made. The Voices are very clear and easy to understand. 

I personally loved the Steam Punk Theme this one brang with it and loved the story and the adventure to get there! The Characters were also very fascinating.

However due to the fact that this Game is not very long I recommend getting it on Sale!

This Game is Vampire approved ✔️

author: {'steamid': '76561198200111790', 'num_games_owned': 294, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1477739883}
review:
一直比较喜欢这类点击解密类游戏，主要还是因为比较休闲，只要点点点就可以了，偶尔玩一玩杀杀时间还是蛮不错的。本作整体难度感觉比较简单，对于我这样的解密苦手算是很友好的啦。

Pros:
+简中支持，虽然是机翻但总比没有好
+场景画面比较精细
+BGM比较舒缓，适合放松调节心情

Cons:
-还是翻译，机翻难免出差，但是这类游戏里翻译出错简直是强行增加游戏难度啊
-部分寻物谜题场景图层覆盖不佳，很容易就能看出来

author: {'steamid': '76561197971048113', 'num_games_owned': 10059, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1660128463}
review:
It was ok for the most part. Ending was rushed and the story could have used more background to it. It wasn't super hard either, which is fine with me. I want interesting stories, not very difficult puzzles.

Pick it up on when on good discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041949592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 605, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1478044449}
review:
Hey everyone and this is my review about the game!

This is a Point and click puzzle game.


[h1]Interface/Menu/Settings[/h1]

You can have multiple profile slots with different names.
There is a Music Slidebar Available.
There is a sound slidebar available.
There is voice over and you are able to toggle this.
You can play the game in fullscreen or windowed mode.
There is a difficulty settings.
There is an extra menu, With Minigames, Hidden object puzzles, Collectables and many more.

[h1]About the game.[/h1]

You are a girl. :( and some old crazy man has called you to help and is searching for answers about the tremors and earthquakes. You have to find and completed puzzles, objects and many other things. But clicking too much will give you a small shake on the screen and it will temporary blurry (nothing to harmful). You will get a small helper beside the Help system. The game has decent animation and puzzles, not too hard and not too easy.

There are some animations going on and they are ok.
There are video scenes and you are able to skip this.
There is an ok story.
There are subtitles and text and a voice over.
There are collectables :(.
There is a hint system and it recharges if you use it. The difficulty depends on the recharge speed.


[h1]Other things.[/h1]

-------------------

I Give this game a 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198049193268', 'num_games_owned': 819, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 529, 'last_played': 1475956979}
review:
Jeu d’aventure / recherche d’objets cachés classique, celui-ci est bien fait et la difficulté me convenait parfaitement : je ne suis jamais resté bloqué très longtemps, mais ce n’était pas non plus toujours d’une simplicité enfantine. Pas trop de va-et-viens non plus comparé à certains autres jeux de l’éditeur.

Certains des mini-jeux sont plutôt difficiles mais il reste toujours possible de les sauter si on le souhaite.

L’histoire est comme toujours chez Artifex Mundi le gros point faible du jeu, mais ce n’est pas pour celle-ci qu’on y joue…

Aucun problème de traduction à signaler, pour une fois !

author: {'steamid': '76561198039137828', 'num_games_owned': 585, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1474910881}
review:
[h1]Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink [/h1]


📝 [b][u]Story[/u][/b]

Man schlüpft in die Rolle von Evangeline Glass die von ihrem alten Freund Dr. Ink um Hilfe gebeten wurde eine Reihe von Erdbeben zu untersuchen. Schon kurz nach der Ankunft unserer Heldin wird der gute Doktor aber entführt und so macht man sich nicht nur auf den Weg um die Ursache der Erdbeben ausfindig zu machen sondern auch Ink zu befreien. Angesiedelt ist das ganze in einer Steampunk-Welt die ich sehr ansprechend fand. Ansonsten ist aber vieles in der Story sehr vorhersehbar.

🎮 [b][u]Gameplay[/u][/b]

Das Gameplay ist typisch für ein Hidden Objekt Spiel. Man bewegt die Heldin von Hintergrund zu Hintergrund, hält nach Objekten Ausschau mit denen man etwas anfangen kann, sucht sich durch Wimmelbilder und löst hin und wieder ein Rätsel. Der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist dabei durchwachsen, es gibt einige sehr leichte und einige etwas schwerere Rätsel, alle sind jedoch mit etwas überlegen gut lösbar. 

Für die etwas fauleren Spieler gibt es natürlich auch eine Hinweis Option und die Möglichkeit Rätsel zu überspringen. Abseits davon gibt es noch eine kleine Nebenaufgabe, die darin besteht Käfer zu finden, wobei jeder Hintergrund genau einen Käfer besitzt. 

🎥 [b][u]Grafik[/u][/b]

Grafisch gehört das Spiel in meinen Augen mit zu den besten Spielen von Artifex Mundi. Die Figuren sehen schon ziemlich gut aus und die Hintergründe und vor allem die Wimmelbilder sind sehr detailreich, aber nicht überladen.

🎶 [b][u]Sound[/u][/b]

Auch der Sound ist in diesem Spiel sehr gelungen. Die Charaktere wurden anständig vertont und die Musik dudelt angenehm im Hintergrund vor sich her ohne einen zu stören.

❤︎ [b][u]Fazit [/u][/b]

Insgesamt das beste Spiel von Artifex, dass mir bisher in die Finger geraten ist. Freunde dieses Entwicklerteams sowie Genrefans können hier beruhigt zuschlagen. Die Spielzeit beträgt übrigens 3 - 5h (mit Bonuskapitel kommt maximal noch eine weitere Stunde hinzu).

[quote]Wenn euch die Review gefallen/geholfen hat dann folgt doch unserem [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/8049466/] Reviewprogramm[/url] und wenn ihr mir etwas zu dieser Review mitteilen wollt dann schreibt gerne in die Kommentare.[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198141775948', 'num_games_owned': 1709, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1475336940}
review:
特徴としてはカラスを飛ばすことができて、それで遠距離のアイテムを取得したりできる点があります。
中盤のアイテムの使い方がちょっと悩みました。
ミニゲームとアイテム探しゲームの数は少なめに感じました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198020606125', 'num_games_owned': 1078, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1402766303}
review:
Geheimagentin Glass wird auf die Suche nach ihren Entführten  Mentor Dr. Ink geschickt.
Welcher dahintergekommen ist wer für die zunehmenden Erdbeben verantwortlich war.
Bei der Geschichte erwartet den Spieler ein Point'n'Click-Adventure, 
Wimmelbilder und Denkspiele.
Die Rätsel sind immer logisch oder zumindest plausibel, 
wodurch der Schwierigkeitsgrad nicht besonders hoch ist.
Eine Karte zeigt uns wo etwas auf Erledigung wartet, 
ein mechanischer Rabe hilft uns um an höher Gelegenes zu kommen.
Fans von Maschinen, Robotern, mechanischen Helferlein 
und allerlei Rätseln werden ihre wahre Freude haben.
Habe mir etwas mehr versprochen war gut zu spielen und kurzweilig
aber nicht außergewöhnlich.

It's quite easy, but fun while it lasts. Doesn't last long though.

review: Good game :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198043495274', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 339, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1474811682}
review: Ambiance agréable, histoire sans trop de fioritures, pas trop de blabla ni de cinématiques, juste ce qu'il faut pour rentrer dedans. Des SOC et jeux classiques plaisants et accessibles. Les succès steam ne demandent pas de recommencer le jeu à plusieurs reprises et les symboles / insectes à collectionner sont facilement identifiables.

author: {'steamid': '76561198191507022', 'num_games_owned': 765, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1474379239}
review:
故事发生在一个蒸汽朋克的背景下，有个丧心病狂的博士研究了一个地震机器，主角和他的老师要去破坏该机器的故事。看我用一句话就能概括这个简单的剧情，可以说平淡无奇。

本作由于发行时间早，所以制作水平上有限，过场动画都是2D，相比Artifex近两年3D化的视觉效果来看显得有些成成旧。

在游戏性上保持了Artifiex社一贯的游戏方式，基本便是不断地到处找东西。那让我讨厌的“找你妹”小游戏也遍布游戏各个阶段，我之所以讨厌这个小游戏是因为这个小游戏显得毫无道理，明明可以自己从一堆杂物中找到有用的非要先找些不相干的。相比之下其他的一些益智小游戏更为有趣，不过如果玩过很多A社的游戏的话还是会觉得有些重复。不过玩过很多的话也不会无聊来看评论的啦~\(≧▽≦)/~

最后购买建议是  有IG的慈善包啦。原价入如果你有钱任性的话在下不会拦着的。慈善包真的超级划算啦，起码这些比喜加一质量要高。

author: {'steamid': '76561198272479023', 'num_games_owned': 2790, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1473759650}
review:
画面精致程度让人大吃一惊。
通过小游戏和找东西来获得线索。
个人觉得不太好的地方：你探索过的地方会随着剧情的发展!才!激活出新的功能。

author: {'steamid': '76561198076822229', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1472957324}
review:
"Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink" is a fun, relaxing game that doesn't demand too much concentration. These kinds of Hidden Object games are not normally my cup of tea, but I found myself enjoying the beautifully illustrated environments and the puzzles.  The most of the puzzles were pretty simple, but still held my attention. The plot was fairly interesting, but I would have enjoyed a bit more character interactions. 
Be aware that this game was really short, so I would recommend buying it when it goes on sale (like I did).
Overall, playing "Clockwork Tales" was a pleasant experience, and I'd be willing to try another game in the series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031651888', 'num_games_owned': 798, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1473789037}
review: Un petit jeu d'aventure "casual" comme on dit. Très simple, mais il a le mérite d'être + qu'un simple jeu d'objets cachés. On a droit à plusieurs puzzles intéressants, même si aucun ne vous bloquera plus de quelques minutes. 2-3 heures suffiront pour finir le jeu.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963377064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 402, 'playtime_forever': 837, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 837, 'last_played': 1527202387}
review:
Very nice steampunk universe & a touch of Hayao Miyazaki.
Story + technically: very cool.
The difficulty is well balanced in all the in-games.
8,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198086794177', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1509117589}
review:
[h1]《发条传说 格拉斯与英克》[/h1]
本人并不是很喜欢这类解谜游戏，但是这个游戏能我坚持玩到通关。剧情还可以，bgm也挺不错的，尤其是发条的声音我觉得很带感。这款游戏算是朋友送的，所以价格不是很清楚。其中包含的寻找物品我表示很头疼，完全靠提示。但是其他的小游戏还是挺有趣的，满成就比较简单，有云存档有卡有成就有中文还是很不错的。
PS：估计首次通关需要4个小时左右吧，奋斗了8个小时终于全成就了=。=

author: {'steamid': '76561197979068807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 238, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1473363939}
review:
Punta-e-clicca non troppo difficile ma con un'ambientazione di tutto rispetto. E' difficile che qualcuno decida di ambientare un titolo in un mondo steampunk, Clockwork Tales è un tentativo abbastanza ben riuscito. La longevità del gioco non è il massimo (in 3-4 ore lo si conclude) ma la grafica godibile e l'audio ben curato fanno dimenticare questo difetto.

Voto: 7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167958424', 'num_games_owned': 1193, 'num_reviews': 525, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1707509116}

author: {'steamid': '76561198054766153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1472678842}
review: This was truly a great experience. The art is easy on the eyes, the puzzles are generally challenging and require thought and strategy, the hidden object scenes often featured small interactive bits (moving things or combining objects to find certain objects) and there's a lot of content for a hidden object game. Some of the animations were laughably ridiculous, and some of the voice acting was atrocious, but the main characters' voices were decent, and that's all that really counts in a game like this. I had a lot of fun with this one, I'll revisit it to get the three achievements I'm missing. PS I played my first playthrough on advanced setting, and it felt like a normal difficulty, which makes me curious how expert mode will be.

author: {'steamid': '76561198189487325', 'num_games_owned': 259, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1472377387}
review: 故事很短，解谜游戏有些挺有创意，那个点物品的游戏完全没必要。70分吧，5分来自中文。

author: {'steamid': '76561198158739744', 'num_games_owned': 698, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1471851065}
review:
蒸汽朋克风格的点击解谜游戏，讲述了一个大反派试图将消除地震的机仪器改造成制造地震的战争机器，但是这一邪恶的计划最终因主人公的智慧和勇气而流产，淹没在主角光环的汪洋大海里。

为什么重要的研发中心只有两个一砸就散架的机器人看守呢？为什么偌大的兵工基地见不到一个工人和一个巡逻的士兵呢？为什么重要的研究成果总是会随着反派的失败而被埋葬呢？

╮(‵▽′)╭总体而言，还是个不错的解谜游戏。

好评：
· 精致的画面
· 两种模式的寻物游戏
· 丰富的谜题
· 有卡
· 有中文
· 慈善包常驻
· 全成就很容易

author: {'steamid': '76561198031491767', 'num_games_owned': 482, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 484, 'last_played': 1472244017}
review:
The story was interesting. The cutscenes were well done. 
Altogether it had a lot more puzzles than HOGs/FROGs. They varied in difficulty which was nice. 
 
This was a well done game for the genre. The only negative thing I have about it is the ending. It was like there was a key part missing because they just sped it up and then everything is over. They didn't bother answering how it happened. You see a portion of how you got there but not the other people. So that was silly to me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052965201', 'num_games_owned': 1046, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1526573325}
review:
Game Mechanics:
The game focuses mainly on logic puzzles and hidden object scenes. Both are pretty decent in their complexity and their difficulty. The main objective of the game is usually to find a specific item in these scenes or acquire passage or entry into a certain area.

Plot:
The plot is relatively thin, it is of the "villain-has-doomsday-device-and-must-be-stopped"-variety. Though this doesn't detract from the enjoyment of the game, as it is sort of only there as an excuse to link the hidden-object-scenes and puzzles together.

Presentation:
Everything is portrayed in a steampunk way and the game is consistent in its display of this genre. The art used in the puzzles is a bit lackluster at times, but the hidden object scenes are very nicely designed. Another point I'd like to bring up is the above-average voice acting for this sort of game.

Completion:
If you're into casual puzzlers or hidden-object-games, go for it. If you're just looking for an enjoyable string of puzzles, also go for it. The achievements aren't very difficult to obtain (especially if you first do a an easy and then an expert play-through).

author: {'steamid': '76561198077378264', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 400, 'last_played': 1471929733}
review: This was a fun point and click style adventure.  Doesn't take too long to play - good for about five hours. It never felt tedious - I was able to finish the puzzles but they were not easy.  There isn't much in the way of action but there is a nice storyline.  I especially liked the saints in the church in the prequel.  I give this game 7 out of 10.  Buy it when it is on sale and you won't regret it if you like puzzle games - definitely worth the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988271944', 'num_games_owned': 1346, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1471517682}
review:
Premetto che non sono un amante di punta e clicca e tantomeno di puzzle game. Cercherò di essere il più obbiettivo possibile. La Artifex Mundi è la prima fra gli sviluppatori di questo tipo di giochi visti i svariati titoli che offre. Il gioco (per mia fortuna) è stato abbastnaza corto, terminato in appena poco meno di 2 ore di gioco. E' consigliato SOLO per gli amanti del genere ma comunque non a questo prezzo che risulta una follia. In generale mi trovo a sconsigliare questo gioco. Prodotto di nicchia.

Voto 5,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197982504799', 'num_games_owned': 4250, 'num_reviews': 2871, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1471144946}
review:
Истории на время:  Рассказаные Гласс и Инком - замечательный "поиск скрытых предметов" в стилистике парапанка, от польских камрадов.

1) [u]Сюжет[/u]: шпионка Евангелина Гласс отправляется на встречу со своим другом и наставником профессором Инком в далекую горную деревню Хохвальд. Привел туда наших героев ряд землетрясений вокруг данной деревни. Сюжет проведет нашу героиню через череду событий которые откроют связь землетрясений, местной машины судного дня, и потомственного правителя данных мест - генерал-инженера Барбера. Сюжет прописан очень хорошо и интересно, единственный минус пожалуй - это косяки в некоторых местах с русским переводом, впрочем это видно уже по русскому названию.

2) [u]Геймплей[/u]: игровой процесс аналогичен другим играм данного жанра, нововведение здесь только в механической птичке, которая может доставать предметы недоступные нашей героине. Соотношение паззлов и поиска "скрытых предметов" примерно один к одному. Сама игра и паззлы в ней очень легкие, и без напряга проходятся на максимальной сложности (сложностей всего 3, и разнятся они наличием подсказок на карте, и скоростью активации пропусков и подсказок). После прохождения основного сюжета, откроется дополнительный эпизод с приквелом, в котором рассказывается о том как доктор Инк нашел свою цель в начале сюжета. В разделе "дополнительное" можно будет перепройти все паззлы и сцены поиска, а также скачать обои на рабочий стол и музыку.

3) [u]Графика и звуки[/u]: картинка в игре сделана в очень хорошем стимпанковском стиле, любителям оного должно понравиться. Есть качественные видеовставки. Музыка приятная, плюс есть хорошая английская озвучка.

[u]Как итог[/u]: еще одна замечательная игра от Artifex Mundi. Любителям жанра "поиска скрытых предметов", парапанка, собирания "идеальных игр" в профиль, да и просто хороших сюжетных игр, рекомендую!
8 механических птичек из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115571614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1470997963}
review:
스팀을 돌아다니다 보면 이 회사의 시리즈 물을 자주 볼 수 있다.
처음에는 게임 표지가 먼가 B급 느낌이 나서 피했는데 최근에 여름세일인가에서 충동적으로 구매한 기억이 난다.

게임을 접하고 나서는 생각을 바꾸게 되었다. 그럭저럭 즐길만한 게임이라고
물론 꼭 해보라는 추천은 아니지만 나쁘지 않게 플레이 할 수 있다는 장점이 있다.

플레이 하면서 느낀 점은 '나 혼자 하는 짜임새 있는 방탈출 카페 체험' 이랄까
방탈출 카페를 한번이라도 이용해 보신분은 알실 듯 하다.
그런 의미에서 싼 값에 방탈출 느낌(?)을 준 점을 높게 사서 이 게임을 추천한다. (할인할때 사길 바람. 사실 꼭 살필요는...)

author: {'steamid': '76561198206168347', 'num_games_owned': 1760, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1470725368}
review:
有趣的小遊戲。
前幾年很流行這種類似的小品遊戲，簡單、劇情又富豐。
大概是少數會想把全部成就都解完的遊戲了！

唯一的缺點就是在解謎過程中，找零件的部份太過小及相似(好在點錯與否不影響到成就)
以及解謎的形式一樣，並無隨機變動。導致可玩性降低不少！(換言之，全成就後大概就不會再玩了！)

推薦在打折時入手，既便宜又可以享受遊戲樂趣！

author: {'steamid': '76561198309501674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1470527692}
review:
Avventura grafica "casual" discreta con ottime illustrazioni e musiche, meno le animazioni spesso appena abbozzate. Enigmi semplici accompagnati da un buon numero di mini-giochi e sezioni "hidden object", queste ultime forse piuttusto ripetetive. La trama promette bene ma si conclude con un finale raffazzonato, come se gli sviluppatori fossero andati fuori tempo massimo e avessero dovuto concludere il gioco in un modo o nell'altro. Piacevole il "bonus" costituito da un mini prequel accessibile solo dopo aver concluso l'avventura principale.
In generale un buon rappresentate della categoria delle avventure grafiche punta & clicca facili facili. La possibilità di ottenre indizi e impostare il livello di difficoltà la rende davvero per tutti ma i puristi del genere è bene che ne stiano alla larga, consiglio valido per qualsiasi gioco appartenente a questa categoria.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103033403', 'num_games_owned': 1906, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1438557945}
review:
The makers of Grim Legends do it again with yet another lovely Hidden Object game. Released in 2013, Artifex Mundi’s Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink is not one of their earlier games… and yet, it kind of plays like one. 
Clockwork Tales is an adventure/hidden object game. If you’ve never played one of those, Artifex Mundi’s are, in my opinion, some of the best you could pick to play. Their dedication to making the games visually stunning and the stories compelling is quite amazing, and they’ve been known to listen to the community and improve on their games. That said, it’s still a far from perfect game, and it was one of my slightly least favorite ones from them. 
In Clockwork Tales you play as Evangeline Glass, a spy of sorts, a special agent working with Intelligence, who goes in the search of her friend, who had disappeared while on the field, working to find out what was causing some mysterious earthquakes. Like in most hidden object games, the story is nothing overly special, but I did like the touch of it being set in a steampunk world, as I feel we’re severely lacking in variation for themes. I do wish the story was slightly less formulaic though, and not just with Artifex Mundi’s game, but with Hidden Objects one in general: Person disappears, other person goes fetch, illogical things happen, evil is shown, evil is defeated. 
I don’t want to spoil the ending, but I was rather disappointed with it. There is advice in writing that says, “Show, don’t tell.” This is especially true of visual media such as videogames. The ending, then, failed this advice. It felt like it came to an abrupt halt, followed by a long winded expositionby Evangeline that didn’t explain anything of what was left unexplained, but that let us know that the bad guy sure got what he deserved! How? Why? We might never know. 
As far as the technical aspect goes, it plays fairly smoothly. 
You have “steambugs” as collectable items. What was a bit different from their other games here was that, while in most games you have x goal amount for the whole game, this one was a goal amount per area. They were also far more noticeable than in other games, which made them quite easy to find. 
The art is decent, though as usual in their older games, some of the characters can look a bit creepy in some of the scenes when the body is drawn oddly. The backgrounds are detailed and gorgeous like in all their games - one of their strongest points. 
Another thing I liked was the use of the pet (a steam-pet this time) to fetch and manipulate items, record movies and sound, etc. The usage of the pet system as more than just something to “fetch” items was a breath of fresh air, and I hope they will use it in more of their games. 

The access to the map was just a bit more annoying than usual, for you have to go into the notebook each time as opposed to directly clicking on the map; plus, each time you fast travel, the map doesn’t close itself. It’s nitpicking a little, I know, but I got used to the ease with which later games handled the map ad fast traveling. 

Clockwork Tales is also a little ‘harder’ in the logic department. Most the hidden object games follow some rather weird logic at times. Say for instance (not a scene taken from the game, mind you, just for illustration purposes on what I mean) you have a pile of ash, and something underneath it. In real life you could use your hands, or whatever item lays close by, to poke and sift through the ash. In a normal hidden object game you’d want some kind of brush, or cloth, or broom, even if you have a perfectly acceptable item for the job nearby. In Clockwork tales, you’d probably have to climb up a flagpole to rip down a flag to then find scissors to cut a piece from it so you can use it on the ash. What? That perfectly acceptable piece of cloth right next to the pile of ash? Oh, we can’t use that!

Later games of Artifex Mundi allow you to skip items on hidden object scenes, or skip the scenes all together, by playing a game of mahjong. Not here. I was sad to be unable to switch it up and play a bit of Mah Jong now and then. 

Another thing I wasn’t as fond of, but this one was more due to personal preference rather than a fault with the game, was that the mini-games were a lot more often the switch and slide games, or the ones were pressing something requires you to do it in the exact order. It was like they had picked all the mini-games I like the least to put them in here. If you do like those games, however, then you will definitely have a better time playing this one than I did!

Lastly, I found a small bug where my inventory would get stuck at the bottom when I finished some puzzles and returned to normal view, which required me to exit and enter the game again to unlock. Not game breaking, but annoying.

Would I recommend it? Yes. Despite the downsides, I had fun playing it. 
There are far worse hidden object games around, but there are also better ones from Artifex Mundi itself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150107495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1469833619}
review:
I was in the mood for an adventure game recently but wanted to play something relaxing rather than like a psychological horror. Then I remembered I had a key for this game from some Humble Bundle a long time ago.

I'll get straight to the gist of things. Clockwork Tales has a target audience, most likely kids or people who don't normally play video games. If you're in that target audience, it's a good buy. If you're not, it probably isn't. I'm still leaving a positive review because in and of itself it's a decent game, it's just that it might not be for you.

Since this was my first time playing a hidden objects game, I can't really comment on the quality of the puzzles. (They were for the most part either “find all the hidden objects” or sort of abstract logic puzzles; traditional “combine this item with that item” challenges were relatively rare.) I can say that they were all rather easy ― with one exception towards the end ― and unfortunately left me feeling unchallenged.

From a technical standpoint, I was actually surprised by production values shown here ― definitely was not expecting cutscenes or talking animations (though the latter were sort of creepy). The game looks beautiful, with really great art everywhere. The music is also fine, although it repeats a bit too much. Story-wise it is inoffensive, albeit not particularly good ― something on the level of an average cartoon.

Overall, it took me 5 hours to complete both the basic game and the bonus prequel adventure (which was a little lower quality than the original). However, you may want to replay the game after completion if you didn't get all the secrets the first time around. There's also an extras section in the menu, which allows you to replay all the minigames.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036656053', 'num_games_owned': 610, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1469471336}
review:
Paz & Luz!

Minha infância foi recheada de encantos graças aos jogos de video-games. Sempre, após jogar, ficava pensando neles e expandia suas histórias mentalmente. O que supriu toda essa minha vontade de ainda continuar naquelas histórias, mesmo após o fim, foi ter conhecido os Adventures. Perder - na vedade ganhar - horas em Monkey Island, Sam & Max etc me engrandecia por dentro,

Logo, ter a vivência renovada com Clockwork é belíssimo. Super indico!
Ainda mais com ótimas legendas em português e, apesar de curto, nos fazer ter a sensação gostosa da imersão.

Reverências!

author: {'steamid': '76561198025697033', 'num_games_owned': 367, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1469396410}
review: Bardzo przyjemna gra, taka idealna na relaks, gdyby nie fakt, że wiele elementów, które chciałem wykorzystać/przeprowadzić jakąś akcję nie działała.. Klikam podpowiedź po kilku minutach prób, a tu się okazuję, że dobrze kombinowałem z samego początku, po prostu źle wychwyciło mój klik.. :/ I relaks zmienia się na burzliwe "No przecież to robiłem! Czemu wtedy nie działało?!" No ale mimo wszystko przyjemnie się grało, fabularnie może niespecjalnie zachwyca, ale zagadki całkiem przyjemne i zróżniczowane.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977667322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1417063174}
review:
This is a basic point and click puzzle game.  It is Ok.  I would give it a So-So rating in that story was not bad and for the type of game it is, i found it enjoyable. 

With that said, i beat it in about 2 hours then spent another hours just trying to get achievements.  Don't expect to get alot of replayability as once you solve a puzzle, you know how.  Overall, not a bad deal as i bought it when it was discounted, but not a real memorable game either.

review:

[h1][b]Worth price[/b][/h1] It deserve almost its full price if you accept the (#) point below and its lenght.

[h1]- Review below ----------------------------------------------------------------------[/h1]

This is one of my favorite Artifex Mundi game even that one is shorter than some I've played before.

Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink takes place in a steam(punk) world where a continuing string of strange earthquakes are causing the world’s cities to crumble to ruin. You play as Evangeline a friend and confident of Dr. Ambrose Ink. The latter asked Evangeline to come to Hochwald and help him out in order to stop the General Engineer of Gottland evil plans and the tremors for good. The bonus story let you play as Dr Ambrose Ink before the Agent Evangeline visit him.

The story and voices are good and graphics as well as music are very good. Puzzles and hidden objects scenes are fairly shared.

The game features an inventory where you can store items to combine with the environment to go deeper in the story as well as a showcase for steam bugs found in each area. In that game you'll have a steam bird as a fellow which will help you to reach things you can't.

The game have several difficulties and have a guest feature : all the family can play the game and resume it where they left. There is also a map which is useful when you're lost and that may have some hints if you play in a easier mode. Also you can use the Hint/Skip hourglass whenever you want and wait until its refill to use it again. But be warned that you may not skip or use a hint in any puzzle or hidden objects scene if you wish to have some achievements.

There is a good choice of puzzles and there are two kind of Hidden objects scenes. The first Hidden objects scene features the name of the objects to find some are found easily (normal one) and some others need you to interact with the environment or to combine two items to found them. The second Hidden objects scene let you find the shape of the objects in the scene and sometimes ask you to combine them with the environment.

(#) :
The game has some achievements that can be missed which are challenging achievements and a difficulty related one. The difficulty achievement asks you to play the game in Expert mode. Challenging achievements require you to finish a puzzle or a hidden objects scene under one minute. You also need to solve every puzzle and hidden objects scene without skipping or using hints. Another achievement requires you to find 3 objects in 3 seconds or find all objects with only 5 or fewer misclicks in the hidden object scenes. Also the steam bugs can be missed if you moved to earlier in a new area but you can still follow a guide on steam to make sure it never happens even if you'll most likely find them easily on your own. Another easy but missable achievement is "People Person" which requires you to talk to everyone before and after Dr vanished. Finally another achievement requires you to complete the bonus story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030756861', 'num_games_owned': 948, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 906, 'last_played': 1466990130}
review:
Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink is a steampunk style HOG along with some puzzles that is a nice uncomplicated diversion. The puzzles in the game are mostly easy to medium even with the difficulty set to hard. Two of the puzzles I would consider to be hard. I enjoyed the story and the characters, they both kept me involved in the game. 

The graphics of the game really set the stage for the steampunk style. They are well done and were one of the main reasons I actually bought the game. The voice-overs and cutscenes are also very good. I found no problems at all with the interface.

Getting all the achievements are fairly easy to do. And if you are good at these types of games I would estimate 8 hours or less to complete the game. If you are really organized 5 hours might do the job.

Overall I give the game a 7 as it is a decent representation of a HOG with very nice graphics and story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000608288', 'num_games_owned': 3299, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1466667528}
review:
You can't go wrong with steampunk unless you really try, but then again you can't always go right with it, which I think is the case with [i]Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink[/i].  All of the necessary elements are here: sweeping fantasy, maniac evildoers, pipes and leathers and conspicuous gearing, airships and monocles and florid facial hair, evil robots and mechanical tinkery.  What's missing is the kind of lucid, engrossing gameplay I like to see from Artifex Mundi. Instead, this game feels forced and vague. 

It's not bad. I just like my Artifex games to stand tall over the competition, and this one is more of a shoulder-to-shoulder proposition. I hit all of the achievements here in a single play-through, and didn't find much in the way of detail and nuance. The various mechanical insects to spot and collect are barely concealed at all, the hidden object scenes are pretty but blunt, and the mini-games are on the bland, simple side. The main challenges are pretty much announced as flat tasks - "I need to paint this room blue before I'll be allowed to leave," that sort of thing. "Where have I seen blue paint? Maybe I should make some." I don't necessarily love game-stopping difficulty levels, but slipping too far in the other direction doesn't make for engaging play.  

Maybe I'm just burning out on the genre; certainly most HOGs are cast from similar molds, and perhaps I'm just overwhelmed by the constant selection of games right now. Recommended, because it's good - but this is one to play on the way to a better one.

About 3 hours of nice, chill-out point&click adventure. Another HOPA game of Artifex Mundi studio with - as usual - perfect graphics and relaxing music. This one tries to explore steam punk aesthetics. It fails to create real suspense and emotions, but it's still perfect choice for people looking for simple and rewarding casual adventure games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062674571', 'num_games_owned': 5359, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1461792240}
review:
Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink to przygodowa gra z gatunku Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure, stworzona przez specjalizujące się w produkcjach tego typu polskie studio Artifex Mundi. Tytuł przenosi nas do górskiego miasteczka Hochwald. Wcielając się w agentkę wywiadu, Ewangelinę Glass, musimy rozwiązać zagadkę zaginięcia doktora Inka. Ostatnią sprawą, którą się zajmował, były niezwykle silne trzęsienia ziemi, niszczące miasta. Jego zdaniem za ich powstaniem nie stały siły natury, a człowiek. Podążając tropem zaprzyjaźnionego naukowca, bohaterka dociera do bram zamczyska Gerharda Berbera, Generała Inżyniera całej krainy Gottlandii.

Gry z gatunku HOPA, ze względu na swój prosty i spokojny model rozgrywki, często mają problemy z zachowaniem spójności i logiki w swoich fabułach, szczególnie gdy występują w nich momenty akcji. Jednak twórcy z polskiego studia stanęli na wysokości zadania i stworzyli ciekawą, trzymającą poziom do samego końca, szpiegowską opowieść, którą poznaje się po prostu przyjemnie. Smaku dodaje wyraźnie zarysowany, steampunkowy klimat. Cieszyć nim możemy się dzięki świetnie wyglądającej oprawie wizualnej. Nie obraziłbym się za nieco płynniejsze i bardziej realistyczne animacje postaci, ale i tak jest dobrze.

Pod względem rozgrywki produkcja prezentuje również wysoki poziom. W sumie jest to typowa HOPA, czyli ukazana z pierwszej osoby klikana przygodówka, polegająca na odpowiednim wykorzystywaniu posiadanych przedmiotów oraz rozwiązywaniu minigier. Te zaś można podzielić na typowe łamigłówki logiczne i sekwencje hidden object, które w tym przypadku zasługują na pewne wyróżnienie. W większości podobnych gier owe sekwencje object ograniczają się do zatłoczonych scen, w których gracz ma za zadanie wskazać wypisane poniżej przedmioty. W Clockwork Tales takich sekwencji oczywiście nie brakuje, ale są one w pewien sposób urozmaicone. Niektóre sceny na przykład wymagają od gracza odnajdywania przedmiotów w odpowiedniej kolejności i wykorzystywania ich do zdobycia kolejnych. Inne za to każą nam odnajdywać obiekty o narysowanym poniżej kształcie pośród porozrzucanych części tego samego typu. Może brzmi to jak mało znaczący szczegół, ale w grach tego typu, o dość powtarzalnej rozgrywce, takie szczegóły się liczą i wpływają pozytywnie na odbiór całej produkcji. Warto zaznaczyć, że Clockwork Tales to produkcja casualowa. Jest stosunkowo prosta, a do tego można podczas jej przechodzenia skorzystać z licznych podpowiedzi i ułatwień. Dla bardziej wymagających graczy przygotowano tryb eksperta, pozwalający nieco podnieść poprzeczkę.

Podsumowując, Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink to naprawdę dobra HOPA, która na swój sposób pokazuje, iż nasze rodzime studio nie ma sobie równych w tworzeniu gier tego typu. Nie jest to oczywiście najlepsza produkcja, w jaką przyszło mi grać, ale te ponad trzy godziny, które z nią spędziłem, wspominam bardzo przyjemnie i praktycznie niczego temu tytułowi zarzucić nie mogę. Fani gatunku zdecydowanie powinni po niego sięgnąć.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026325706', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1462335856}
review:
The visuals are great with all the staples of steampunk: clockworks, robots, dirigibles, etc. 

The hidden object puzzles are just right: clear but not overly obvious. 

The other puzzles are varied, some those we've seen a million times in other games such as this, others a bit more original. I think I only skipped one puzzle near the end to power through the end quickly. 

The story is very bland with a Nazi-style commander and his regime trying to take over the world and yelling at you often. I lost interest about 30 minutes from the end, but I still enjoyed this overall as a quick, casual game. My total play time was about 3.5 hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161279682', 'num_games_owned': 1731, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1488334111}
review:
Sin duda no es de mis títulos favoritos. Si bien me gusta el estilo retrofuturista creo q se desperdició la posibilidad de hacer escenarios más impresionantes y estéticos, la calidad gráfica en general es regular, no desagrada, pero tampoco impacta (como deberían en esta clase de juegos).

La historia es algo simplona y realmente corta, no hay mucho desarrollo de personajes ni historia de fondo, y es llegar al pueblo y enseguida saber quién es el villano, sin misterios ni nada.

En definitiva, un juego muy regular q no es ni fu ni fa. Lo voto positivo porque no es q me desagradó, pero si hubiera un botón de neutral seria esa mi calificación.

review: This is a short point-and-click game by Artiflex. As others game of the genre, this one has interesting puzzles and good hidden objects scenes. The differential of this game is that the puzzles are very easy to solve, and the hidden objects scenes are simple. The main plot isn't very good, but the game is well constructed and worth the try. Buy it in a promotion, if it is possible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133595485', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1460842813}

Przeurocza i śliczna gierka. W sam raz, gdy chcemy zagrać w coś małego i niezbyt wiele wymagającego. Szybko się instaluje, szybko się przechodzi całą grę.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194289627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1460793157}
review:
- Great voice-overs (well above par for this whole genre, IMO). All of them except for one particular peasant in one particular (and very brief) scene, anyway.

- nice animations, in particular those of people speaking. Nicely done.

- music... i can't remember it, which means it didn't get on my nerves. That counts as a plus.

- i appreciate the "collectibles" (the Steambugs), though i am not OCD enough to lose any sleep if i happen to miss any of them.

- _One_ complaint (again... i feel like a broken record...): ambiguous terms in HO scenes are a real drag. In the kitchen, you've got to find a "pot." There are _four_ of them in the HO scene. Four pots. At least (i stopped counting at four). There's also an ambiguous "ring" in one scene (with 3 rings in it: one keyring and two finger rings). Come on, devs! Use Google Images to double-check!!!

- So far well within a tolerable "what the HELL just happened?" ratio (specifically, the owl and the snowball is the only one which comes to mind). HOPAs with too many of those go in my trash can.

i've gotta thumb-up this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077147190', 'num_games_owned': 1268, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1484514328}
review: Ein kurzweiliges Wimmelbildspiel in einem (deutsch/österreichischen) Steampunk-Universum. Ich habe das Spiel auf "Schwer" durchgespielt - Die Rätsel empfand ich dabei im Vergleich zu anderen Wimmelbildspielen schwerer. Für meinen Geschmack hätte es im Hauptspiel ein paar Wimmelbildszenen mehr geben können, aber das ist hier wirklich nicht weiter schlimm. Im Bonuskapitel gibts dann noch genügend Wimmelbildszenen. Das Spiel selbst ist stark storylastig und ziemlich atmosphärisch (wenn man mal die übertriebenen Akzente mancher Sprecher weglässt^^), man hat hier wirklich das Gefühl, auf die Lösung des Falls hinzuarbeiten. Für mich eins der besseren Wimmelbildspiele.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142377217', 'num_games_owned': 947, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1459358978}
review:
An Artifex Mundi hidden-object game.
Interesting short-story, interesting graphics, good mechanics, quite easy difficulty-wise, ok music that never felt repetitive.
I don't think anyone can really not enjoy this relaxing puzzle solving game, totally recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198277011659', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1458824052}
review: I have to admit that I was a little sceptical of this game, being one of the older Artifex Mundi releases on Steam. But this game is really good and have an amazing steampunk theme that Artifex Mundi really nails with their beautiful artwork. The story is really good too. It was a little on the short side based on game time. I played this twice and have only about 4.5h of gametime, granted that the second playthrough was really quick since I remembered alot from the first time. But even if the game was a little short, it was still good enough for me to play a second time so I really enjoyed the time that I got from this. I strongly recommend this if you like hidden object/puzzle games and of course if enjoy the steampunk style that they made in this game. 7.4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198033995360', 'num_games_owned': 2161, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 357, 'last_played': 1458835741}
review:
On peut reprocher, entre autres choses, à certains jeux Artifex Mundi d'être trop génériques, d'avoir l'inspiration fade. En signant l'adaptation d'un roman polonais que personne n'a lu, les maîtres du jeu d'objets cachés ont mis leur vice entre parenthèses le temps d'une aventure au royaume du steampunk, du simili-cuir, des dorures qui ont l'air plus luxueuse qu'elles ne le sont, le royaume de la rouille, du jaune, du rouge et de l'orange. Réservez votre après-midi, annulez votre dîner aux chandelles avec Naomi Watts et piquez-vous la veine d'un vaccin contre le tétanos. Vous embarquez pour l'Occident Express, direction plein Nord.

Clockwork Tales est superbe ; chaque écran de jeu s'ouvre comme une fenêtre sur un autre monde, un continent froid tyrannisé par des nazillons en costume où l'on croise des automates en cuivre. Vous posez pied à terre à Hochwald, une bourgade glaciale où les hommes s'emmitouflent dans des fourrures aux relans marrons, tous attirés par le chaud d'une auberge où il fait bon renifler la fumée d'un café. Dehors, la surface est recouverte d'un manteau de neige peuplé de lumières bouillantes.

Lancé à la poursuite d'une espèce de Mengele inoffensif, on recouvre le sol de nos va-et-vient. Mais parce qu'il est facile, Clockwork Tales ne frustrera pas même votre grande tante malvoyante ou votre adolescent de cousin qui ne sait qu'écraser les piétons d'un GTA - pas même en mode expert. Mieux rythmé que d'autres jeux de sa gamme, [i]Of Glass and Ink[/i] a la saveur d'un jeu d'aventure classique ; on passe plus de temps à explorer son monde et à y résoudre des énigmes qu'à chasser les objets planqués. De temps en temps, on s'arrête et débusque les quelques pixels qui veulent jouer à cache-cache, puis on reprend la direction de cette encoche dans laquelle on voulait fourrer un emblème. La faiblesse du scénario, comme trop souvent simple prétexte au voyage, est contrebalancée par un découpage de notre progression qui rappelle les ''vrais'' point & click. Les péripéties nous font aller de l'avant et nous empêchent de revenir sur nos pas, alors on avance, poussé au cul par les aléas du chemin jusqu'à ce château où patrouillent des golems de métal, jusqu'à ces sous-sols volcaniques aux ventres rouges. Une poignée d'heures plus loin, on quitte l'écran d'ordinateur des couleurs plein la tête. Alors on revient dans un corps qui a faim et soif, la peau parcourue de chair de poule, encore convaincu d'avoir voyagé loin.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047455579', 'num_games_owned': 2682, 'num_reviews': 1289, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1458878043}
review:
Very good point and click puzzle game. Production value is among the best I have ever seen for the genre. Every character is voice-acted. Animations are top notch. Puzzles are all varied and fun. 

Artifex Mundi has earned a fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076732841', 'num_games_owned': 429, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1518601891}
review: 간단하게 즐기기 좋은 게임. 퍼즐이 상당히 직관적이고 맵이 작아서 전문가 난이도로 플레이 해도 쉬움. 플레이 타임은 약 2~3시간.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002880237', 'num_games_owned': 6185, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 505, 'last_played': 1590153625}
review:
이쪽 계열의 어드벤쳐 게임은 하나같이 나에게 실망을 주는거 같습니다.
빈약한 스토리, 빈약한 연출...
단지 어드벤쳐라는 이유로 게임들을 샀고, 이번에는 재미있겠지 라고 생각하면서 플레이 하지만 여지없이 기대가 무너지는거 같습니다.

어드벤쳐를 좋아한다고 무조건 사는건 일단 자제하는걸 권장합니다.

[현제 이 게임의 유일한 추천요소는 한글화 라는거 하나 뿐인거 같습니다.]

author: {'steamid': '76561198082141811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1455391112}
review:

Pour tout les amateurs de se type de jeu il est sublime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198189451527', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1456394903}
review:
这一作的游戏体验比较好.场景里的物件分布简洁,找东西不会很频繁,而且逐层递进式的找东西模式更贴合现实.收集虫子也是简单明了绝不会漏.每种虫子甚至还有说明介绍,各有不同的习性,算是一个用心的小亮点

谜题还是老几样,容易的很.中文翻译比较准,基本不会造成阻碍.

剧情上平铺直叙,算是流畅.只是最后关头交代的不明不白,似乎漏掉了些重要转折就强行结尾了

总之还算可以.

ps.制作名单结尾有个'外星事务指导',听上去十分唬人.是专门设计拿猫薄荷逗猫这一段的人吗...

author: {'steamid': '76561198222676772', 'num_games_owned': 1224, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1457092927}
review:
[h1] Этот обзор - моё личное мнение![/h1]

[h1]ОПИСАНИЕ[/h1]

Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink - это игра в жанре "поиск предметов", в стимпанковской стилистике. Игра повествует нам о том, как в одном непреметном городке начали происходить землетрясения, которые никак не связаны с природой. Наша главная героиня - Евангелина, приезжает в город по просьбе своего друга - Инка, но как только мы начинаем играть, его тут же похищают. И вот на протежении всей игры мы будем искать Инка и бороться со злым учёным.

 [h1]ПЛЮСЫ[/h1]

- Красивая графика.
- Механическая птичка, которая разнообразит геймплей.
- Приятная музыка.
- Очень лёгкие достижения.

[h1]МИНУСЫ[/h1]

- Локализация просто ужасна.
- Сильно различается разница в сложности головоломок.
- Продолжительнось. ( хотя все игры в этом жанре короткие ).

[h1]ИТОГ[/h1]

Из всех игр в этом жанре, эта мне понравилась меньше всего. Советую её только тем, кто очень сильно любит этот жанр, или хочет ещё одну 100% игру.
Моя оценка 6/10.

С уважением m@ximov -  [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/steamorators] "Ораторы ste@m". [/url]

review:

- bardzo ładna grafika
- atmosfera Steampunku
- ciekawa historia

Minusy:
- krótka - 3,5h na poziomie expert
- dość proste zagadki i łamigłówki

author: {'steamid': '76561198046840300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1455309855}
review:
Что может омрачить визит в гости к вашему старому наставнику, заменившему вам отца, больше, чем увидеть, как этого наставника похищает гигантский человекоподобный робот? Утаскивает его в железной клетке в сторону замка злобного тирана. А вы остаетесь на руинах разрушенной гостиницы, и сверху вас засыпает снег, пыль и жучки… Вот такую сцену можно будет увидеть в этой игре – головоломке в декорациях стимпанка.  
Как свойственно стимпанковским произведениям, Clockwork Tales показывает мир, где человеческий разум берет под контроль машины. Они предстают очеловеченными и не зря украшаются разными инкрустациями и узорами, а чтобы радовать глаз. Конфликта между органиками и синтетиками практически нет. Тогда как в других жанрах, например, киберпанк, машины могут подчинять людей, либо напрямую, либо  показывают мир, где чем совершеннее прогресс, тем менее человечно общество (и менее похоже на людей). Но в этой игре возникает угроза того, что человек, решивший управлять армией машин, - злой гений.  И героине необходимо его остановить и машину его землетрясную сломать. Да и для наставника она – последняя надежда.
Вообще в этой игре 2 злодея: Барбер и созданная им механическая многоножка. Не в каждой игре найдется такое хищное и ужасное чудовище. Многоножка тоже довольно неприятна. Но она всего лишь машина. А Барберу, конечно, нужна не власть над миром, а психиатр. Жаль, что мало раскрыли его характер. Непонятно, как он стал таким. Папа ли его так воспитал (мужчина на картине в замке), или жажда власти в нем пробудилась вопреки стараниям окружающих, может быть, после какой-то травмы? Если вы внимательно приглядитесь к изображению Барбера на постере игры, или попробуете поздороваться с ним за руку, вы поймете, что у этого типа, скажем так, много общего с Дартом Вейдером. Кстати, его звание - генерал-инженер – реальное воинское звание, существовавшее в Российской империи до 1917 года. Хотя тут может быть просто совпадение. 
А у героини с определенного этапа появляется помощник – механический ворон. Он может добраться до каких-то предметов на высоте. И вообще с ним не так скучно и не так страшно прыгать вниз дирижабля на планере, спасаясь от солдат. 
Пожалуй, без преувеличения можно сказать, что эта игра – шедевр разработчиков, по крайней мере на тот год выпуска. У нее есть стиль. Сцены поиска предметов очень тщательно прорисованы. Не просто валяется куча предметов, из них надо что-то выбирать по списку. Нет, размещены предметы аккуратно, чувствуется, что они спрятаны с хитрым умыслом. Мини-игр много. Некоторые из них перекочевали в другие игры этого производителя или из них в неизменном виде. Но это не вызывает особого разочарования. Наоборот, знакомые головоломки удобнее проходить. Еще, пожалуй, в этой игре идет поиск самых забавных объектов. Я имею в виду паровых жучков. Они ползают по локациям, хотя некоторых надо доставать из плафонов ламп, проводя разные манипуляции. Даже если вы не любите насекомых, интересно почитать описания всех этих алкогольных муравьев, багов, жуков, обученных носить письма в тюрьму и т.д. Также игра очень дружелюбна в плане получения всех достижений.   
Clockwork Tales переводится не «Истории на время», а скорее «Заводные истории». Имена у героев говорящие. Инк переводится чернила, а Гласс – стекло. Барбер – морозный ветер.  Но если тут есть какой-то тайный смысл, мне он остался непонятен. Финал очень скомканный. Но это та ситуация, когда процесс прохождения интереснее, чем результат. 
В целом, это замечательная игра, как для любителей квестов по поиску предметов, так и для тех, кто только открывает для себя этот жанр.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084225457', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1451811281}
review:
Un bon moment avce ce petit jeu ! Sans doute mon favori d'Artifex Mundi à ce jour. :) 

Les plus
- L'univers steampunk et les graphiques sont vraiment bien sympathiques. Cela change vraiment des autres univers (plutôt orientés fantastique) qu'on a l'habitude de rencontrer. 
- Les énigmes sont variées et équilibrées.
- Le petit compagnon, Matthew qui peut nous aider
- Les succès sont réalisables en une fois, pas besoin de refaire TOUT le jeu comme dans certaines jeux du genre. 

Les moins
- Assez court

author: {'steamid': '76561198133170269', 'num_games_owned': 1796, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 806, 'last_played': 1455043533}
review:
用了一晚上时间通关+2周目，难得拿了全成就，就来评测一下吧。
游戏流程不算长，即便专家模式二周目也不觉得烦，所有小游戏和各种成就并不需要查攻略，蛮良心的，剧情嘛。。。感觉不如以前玩过的其他游戏那么跌宕起伏、曲折离奇，比较平淡，算是美中不足吧。自带简中，打折入的，所以我给 7.5/10 吧。
推荐给喜欢这类游戏的人，打折入就好。[spoiler] 追求大片感的话就算啦。[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198020730354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 413, 'last_played': 1454550851}
review: Pretty graphics, reasonably coherent plot, reasonably coherent puzzles. It's a bit easy and a bit short, but I bought it on a steam sale for $3.99 and it provided me a couple of light evenings of entertainment, plus another to finish all the achievements, so that doesn't seem terrible to me. I'd recommend playing it on "Expert" the first time around not only to up the challenge level a little bit but also so you don't have to *replay* it to get all the achievements if thats something you think you might want to do. Overall, I won't remember this game a month from now, but I had fun while it lasted.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103005908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1454152325}
review: This game could have been much better if it had been longer, it is way to short for my taste. When you just have started to get into the story, it is suddenly over.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028322145', 'num_games_owned': 473, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1451237349}
review:
Um bom jogo que mistura puzzles de encontrar objetos com puzzles de combinação de itens de inventário. Alguns são bastante desafiadores, mas no geral o jogo é muito casual e fácil. Há a possibilidade de pular o puzzle caso você fique preso nele por muito tempo.

Graficamente o jogo é muito bonito, com certeza essa é a empresa que faz os jogos mais bem acabados que conheço. O 2D é impecável e os efeitos 3D que aparecem são simples.

O jogo só peca na história, que é extremamente simples, sem reviravoltas e com poucos personagens. E é bastante curto, em menos de 4 horas é possível completar o jogo sem dificuldades.

Paguei cerca de 5 reais em promoção e acho que é um preço mais do que justo para quem procura puzzles e um jogo com acabamento de primeira. Possui legendas em português e vários colecionáveis caso queira completar 100%. O replay é inexistente uma vez que você já sabe a solução dos quebra cabeças. Possui achievements e não possui cartas colecionáveis steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090443638', 'num_games_owned': 3521, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1454786625}
review:
Pros:

Colorful

Cons:
Too short
Bad use of secondary characters, they felt bland

I like this kind of games and I collect them, but so far this is one of the worst I have played of the artifex.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011478984', 'num_games_owned': 2007, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1454247650}
review:
这是通关的第25个steam游戏了。一句话，就是典型的artifex mundi游戏，画面精美，谜题经典，全简中化。
另外呢，永不磨灭的女主角，到了番外才是标题里的英克教授做主角，然而内容还是讲述教授如何落入敌人手中的。。。
这作流程感觉有点短啊，也许是玩的类型游戏多了解谜速度加快而已。背景剧情还是蒸汽朋克的感觉，人物的装扮像19世纪人，但是科学家雕像里面还有爱因斯坦，看来是个架空历史。  找隐藏物简单了很多，每个场景都有一只机械昆虫，别漏了就全收集了。
最后还得说，有中文真好。

author: {'steamid': '76561198023666926', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1772, 'playtime_forever': 857, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1688435237}
review:
Games from Artifex Mundi are good or very good, this one is definitely not bad either :)
Solid HOG game, very nice and detailed visuals, quite decent puzzles and fun gameplay. Story is also not bad

I don't have to high expectations when it comes to HOG games I like playing this type of games when my computer is rendering something or I waiting for client feedback and hog games and simple indie games are perfect for that, almost no resources are needed to play it and meantime I can do some heavy rendering and keep eye on progress on second screen while playing game :)
So almost any HOG game is perfect for me, it have to very bad to disappoint me and this one is very good :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198120181208', 'num_games_owned': 1343, 'num_reviews': 432, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1453759319}
review:
Tja, was soll ich sagen~
Ein Artifex Mundi Spiel mit einer interessanten Geschichte. Die Grafik ist für ein Point&Click Spiel gut.
Man darf nicht vergessen das es schon etwas älter ist. ;P
Die Musik ist passend und die Rätsel kennt man aus den anderen Teilen. :3
Leider fand ich das Spiel sehr sehr kurz und das Bonuskapitel noch kürzer...xD
Aber für ein Artifex Mundi Fan ein "muss". ^u^
